data.lore: Once a mortal man blinded by his own hubris, Azir has recently returned as an Ascended being with unmatched dominion over the burning sands. He seeks to restore Shurima to its former glory, but some dispute his right to rule them. Azir’s power, however, is undeniable.
data.name: Azir
data.title: the Emperor of the Sands

spells.tooltip: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers toward a target location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies they pass through and apply a stacking {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.
spells.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers toward a target location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to all targets they pass through and apply a stacking slow for 1 second.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers toward a target location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies they pass through and apply a stacking {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.
spells.name: Conquering Sands
spells.sanitizedDescription: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers toward a target location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to all targets they pass through and apply a stacking slow for 1 second.

spells.tooltip:
Azir summons a Sand Soldier for {{ e1 }} seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks instead of Azir, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in a line. If multiple soldiers strike the same target, each soldier after the first deals 25% damage. Soldiers attack even if Azir himself isn't in basic attack range.

Azir can store up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers at a time. A new soldier becomes available every {{ f1 }} seconds. Moving too far away from soldiers deactivates them. Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret.

Azir can expend a soldier to damage an enemy turret by summoning it on top of the turret. This deals {{ f4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to the turret.
spells.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for {{ e1 }} seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks instead of Azir, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in a line. If multiple soldiers strike the same target, each soldier after the first deals 25% damage. Soldiers attack even if Azir himself isn't in basic attack range. Azir can store up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers at a time. A new soldier becomes available every {{ f1 }} seconds. Moving too far away from soldiers deactivates them. Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret. Azir can expend a soldier to damage an enemy turret by summoning it on top of the turret. This deals {{ f4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to the turret.
spells.name: Arise!
spells.sanitizedDescription: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line.

spells.tooltip: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking them up for {{ e1 }} seconds. If Azir hits an enemy champion, he stops and gains a {{ e6 }} second shield that absorbs {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [15% of bonus Health] damage.
spells.description: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, knocking up and damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a shield.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking them up for {{ e1 }} seconds. If Azir hits an enemy champion, he stops and gains a {{ e6 }} second shield that absorbs {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [15% of bonus Health] damage.
spells.name: Shifting Sands
spells.sanitizedDescription: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, knocking up and damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a shield.

spells.tooltip:
Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies will be stopped by Emperor's Divide, even if they attempt to dash over the wall, but Azir and his allies can pass freely and gain {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second when they pass through the wall.

Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.
spells.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies will be stopped by Emperor's Divide, even if they attempt to dash over the wall, but Azir and his allies can pass freely and gain {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second when they pass through the wall. Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.
spells.name: Emperor's Divide
spells.sanitizedDescription: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.

passive.name: Shurima's Legacy
passive.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets. Additionally, Azir gains Attack Speed based on the amount of Cooldown Reduction he has.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets. Additionally, Azir gains Attack Speed based on the amount of Cooldown Reduction he has.
